mc.printedText: When Marshdrinker Giant comes into play, destroy target Island or Swamp an opponent controls.
mc.flavorText: When giants rise from their long slumbers, they rarely remember how fragile the waking world can be.

mc.printedText: When Soul Snuffers comes into play, put a -1/-1 counter on each creature.

mc.printedText:
Flying

Trample

mc.printedText: When Regal Force comes into play, draw a card for each green creature you control.

mc.printedText: {2}{R}, {T}, Put a -1/-1 counter on a creature you control: Hatchet Bully deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
